description: Made for the backcountry, this hardshell jacket is the stuff of freeriding dreams: It’s extremely breathable, lightweight, and packs down small. Featuring a Pertex Shield Air membrane, this waterproof jacket fuses great weather protection with impressive breathability. Underarm ventilation keeps things cool, while spacious front pockets provide plenty of room to store your gear. A freeride-inspired cut gives you full freedom of movement with a casual style.
name: Mammut Haldigrat Air HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
